citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 3:50 PM on 20-Jul-
2022. Inspector arrived at the facility and knocked on door with no response. Inspector called the facility representative
who said he is unavailable until 7 pm and there is no authorized contact to perform a facility inspection.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b)  Repeat
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 3:50 PM on 20-Jul-
2022. Inspector arrived at the facility and knocked on door with no response. Inspector called the facility representative 
who said he is unavailable until 7 pm and there is no authorized contact to perform a facility inspection. 
 
 
 
End Section
